page.title: 20HOME LIFE
page.content:
{Domestic Appliances}owned by the 34 families of class 5 in Eastern Green Junior School. Electric cooker 16, Gas cooker 18, Food mixer 26, Toasted sandwich 16, Coffee maker 21, Electric kettle 28, Deep fryer 13, Electric iron 34, Toaster 20, Microwave oven 9, Washing machine 34,Dishwasher 5, Tumble dryer 21, Refrigerator 34, Deep freeze 34, Electric knife 6. {Garden & D.I.Y. tools, Lawn mowers,electric 26,petrol 4,'man' powered 8. Hedge clippers 5.Electric drill 32, Sanders 10, Paintstripper 10
This information compiled by the 34 children of Eastern Green.Jnr.Sch. Coventry, born between 1.9.1974 & 31.8.75. with some help from children of Heart of England School, Balsall Common,Warickshire.
